resources.string:
1. Select "Game 1".
2. Select Level 1, 2, 3, or 4.
3. Press "Start" and SIMON will give the first signal.
4. Repeat the signal by pressing the same button.
5. SIMON will duplicate the first signal and add another signal.
6. Repeat the two signals by pressing the buttons.
7. Continue in this manner as long as you can repeat each sequence of signals correctly.
8. If you fail to repeat a sequence exactly or if you take more than 5 seconds to repeat a signal, SIMON responds with a "RAZZ" sound; you have lost.

Game 2
Similar to Game 1 but at a faster tempo and with 14 sequence.
Game 3\nSimilar to Game 1 and 2 but at a much faster tempo and with 20 sequence

This application is a clone of the 1978 Milton Bradley game SIMON.

This application was programed by Joseph 'Caleb' Mangrum and Kristopher Micik.
All images in this application were created by Kristopher Micik.\n

All audio files in this application were acquired from www.pacdv.com

wrong.mp3 - http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/interface_sounds.html - Interface Sound 16

green.wav - http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/interface_sounds-2.html - Interface Sound 51

blue.wav - http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/interface_sounds-2.html - Interface Sound 52

yellow.wav - http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/interface_sounds-2.html - Interface Sound 53

red.wav - http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/interface_sounds-2.html - Interface Sound 55

win.wav - http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/miscellaneous_sounds.html - Dhol Drums
